VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Alex Laboratory?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Alex Laboratory is arc {Royal Academy}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Alex Laboratory?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Alex Laboratory is arc {NIT}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Alex Laboratory} has the largest input flow.

What is the flow value from Royal Academy to NIT in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Royal Academy and Herman Research Center in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Royal Academy and Herman Research Center is {9}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between NIT and Royal Academy in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between NIT and Royal Academy is {17}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from NIT?
SC.A: The total flow output from NIT is {83}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Herman Research Center?
SC.A: The total flow input by Herman Research Center is {36}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 28? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {33} from {Alex Laboratory} to {NIT}, a flow of {34} from {NIT} to {Alex Laboratory}, a flow of {32} from {NIT} to {Herman Research Center}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 14? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {4} from {Royal Academy} to {Herman Research Center}, a flow of {9} from {Herman Research Center} to {Royal Academy}, a flow of {12} from {Royal Academy} to {Alex Laboratory}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 18 and 21? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {19} from {Alex Laboratory} to {Royal Academy}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Alex Laboratory to Royal Academy or from Royal Academy to Herman Research Center?
NC.A: The flow from {Alex Laboratory} to {Royal Academy} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from NIT to Royal Academy, from Herman Research Center to NIT, or from Royal Academy to Alex Laboratory?
NC.A: The flow from {Herman Research Center} to {NIT} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Alex Laboratory}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Alex Laboratory} and {NIT}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Alex Laboratory, Arc NIT, Arc Royal Academy, Arc Herman Research Center}.
